Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Mafube_Colliery. Coordinates are for the Mafube Colliery, which is an operating coal mine in Middelburg, Nkangala, Mpumalanga, South Africa. Web search geocoded. Source: Calculated from Middelburg (https://www.gem.wiki/Mafube_Colliery). The Mafube Coal Mine is a 50:50 joint operation co-owned by Exxaro and Thungela Resources Limited, located 30 km east of Middelburg

operators: South Africa Coal Operations Proprietary Limited
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated as a joint venture between Exxaro and Thungela, with additional community and employee ownership.
